key_themes: AI semiconductor demand and infrastructure buildout
Crypto ecosystem bifurcation - financial vs non-financial applications
Fed policy uncertainty and rate path debate
Valuation compression risk in high-multiple growth
Options-driven price magnetism toward strike concentrations
risk_factors: Earnings guidance deterioration spreading from enterprise software to broader sectors
Fed policy pivot if inflation data shifts hawkish could trigger risk-asset deleveraging
Crypto non-financial sector valuation bubble (380x P/E multiples cited) risking contagion to quality assets
Geopolitical tail risks (Taiwan, Russia-Ukraine) overwhelming monetary tailwinds
Regulatory tightening across banking and technology creating margin compression
